name: Haiku Deck for WordPress
author: The Team at Haiku Deck

sections.description:
This plugin registers Haiku Deck ( haikudeck.com ) as an oEmbed content provider and adds it to the whitelist, allowing all users to use this provider.

Here’s more information about embeds for WordPress
https://codex.wordpress.org/Embeds
sections.installation:
Installing The Plugin

Extract all files from the ZIP file, making sure to keep the file structure intact, and then upload it to /wp-content/plugins/. Then just visit your admin area and activate the plugin. That’s it!

See Also: “Installing Plugins” article on the WP Codex

short_description: Register Haiku Deck as an oEmbed content provider
description:
This plugin registers Haiku Deck ( haikudeck.com ) as an oEmbed content provider and adds it to the whitelist, allowing all users to use this provider.

Here’s more information about embeds for WordPress
